General.Name: Binh Minh Plastics JSC
General.Description: Binh Minh Plastics Joint Stock Company manufactures and trades in plastic pipes and fittings for water supply and drainage, telecommunication, electricity, industrial, and civil construction industries in Vietnam. Its products portfolio includes uPVC, HDPE, PP-R, and HDPE double wall corrugated pipes and fittings, as well as fittings for irrigation, rubber seals, solvent cements, HDPE double wall corrugated rubber seals, and sprayers and protect helmets. The company also designs, manufactures, and trades in molds for the plastic and casting industry; manufactures and trades in machinery and equipment, supplies, and sanitary equipment for the construction and interior decoration industry. In addition, it is involved in the consultancy and execution of water supply and drainage works, yards and services of chemical inspection, and analysis and testing activities; and trade, import, and export raw materials, chemicals, supplies, and machinery and equipment for plastic, engineering, construction, water supply, drainage, and laboratory equipment. Binh Minh Plastics Joint Stock Company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. Binh Minh Plastics Joint Stock Company is a subsidiary of Nawaplastic Industries Co., Ltd.
